original_text: The sun is beautiful in a special way. The moon is also beautiful in a special way, but it is different from the sun. The stars are beautiful too, and each star is beautiful in its own special way.
korean_text: 해의 영광이 다르고 달의 영광이 다르며 별의 영광도 다른데 별과 별의 영광이 다르도다

sentences.original_text: The sun is beautiful in a special way.
The moon is also beautiful in a special way,
but it is different from the sun.
and each star is beautiful in its own special way.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 각 별은 자신만의 특별한 방식으로 아름답습니다.
